Sentencas: In the middle temperature region (600 degrees C-700 degrees C), Ca doping is the best choice among the three alkaline earth elements.

Sentencas: However, Ba doping easily generates BaCO3 impurities, which reduces the ion transmission capacity and increases the interface resistance, resulting in poor performance of the single cell.

Sentencas: This work shows that La(1.5)A(0.5)NiO(4+delta)(A = Ca and Sr) is the main cathode candidate material for H-SOFC.
